node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers on August 07, 2021. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
The Question Is To See It All...
⠀
On this hot summer day, we're coolin off with one of our newest, and boldest draft beers at 112 Lake St. The Question Is To See It All is a 9.5% Triple IPA brewed with oats, fermented with passion fruit, and conditioned on pineapple and blood orange. This TIPA was also dry-hopped with a little bit of Whitefield Hops' Columbus. The fruits utilized in this beer combine to create something special. As expected, this beer drinks like a tropical fruit smoothie. Notes of Orange Julius and Guava coat the palate. We're looking around wondering where the palms trees are with this one in our hands... Hope you enjoy. Pouring on-site and in growlers to-go. Happy Saturday everyone.

[Music Tonight]
@osageorangemusic hits the stage tonight at 9!! Be there!
⠀
#thequestionistoseeitall #darkside #nicolasjaar #tripleipa #tipa #tropicalfruit #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Foam Brewers on August 05, 2021 tagging @stevesharonart. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
We got a wild one for ya. Available now: Odd Pets 082021A, a Fruited Gose-Style Sour Ale, and Things I Imagined, a Fruited IPA.⠀
⠀
August has arrived and we're kicking it off with a beer that fits the season. For our latest version of Odd Pets, we were able to source a couple rather uncommon tropical fruits. This Gose-Style Sour was conditioned on Lulo and Curuba, as well as Sea Salt. Each of these fruits brings forth bright citrus characteristics that we thought would be complimented quite well in a Gose-style beer, along with Sea Salt. On the nose, passion fruit and pineapple jump right out at you. To follow, a strong citrus kick accompanied by a beautiful full body and a welcome salinity. On the finish, a quenching tartness that lingers just for a second before evaporating, leaving you poised for that next sip. We can't wait to share this one with you. 5% abv.⠀
⠀
The art on this series is by our friend @stevesharonart.⠀
⠀
In addition, we have one of our favorite Fruited IPAs, Things I Imagined. This beer is 6.5% and is brewed with lactose and conditioned with pineapple and vanilla bean. It's dry-hopped with Citra and Motueka, and puts forth notes of candied fruit with a creamy body. The photography on this can is by none other than @MontgomerySheridan.⠀
⠀
Both beers, as well as the three from yesterday's post are available now both in Burlington and Hinesburg.⠀
⠀
#sourale #oddpets #ipa #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.text:
Available now in Burlington: Built To Spill, Wipeout Beat, and Dead Wax.⠀
⠀
Built To Spill, 8% Double IPA ⠀⠀
Dry-hopped with Citra and Galaxy⠀⠀
Notes of citrus, pineapple, and tangerine⠀⠀
Art by @jackson.tupper⠀⠀⠀
⠀
Wipeout Beat, 10% Triple IPA⠀
Dry-hopped Riwaka, Sultana and Bru - 1⠀
Notes of Pineapple juice, white grape, creamy⠀
In memory of @officialalanvega. Art by @michaelhandis⠀
⠀
Dead Wax, 7.2% IPA⠀
Dry-hopped with Denali, Vic Secret and Azacca.⠀
Notes of tangerine, pineapple and creamsicle. Art by @smallsuture created January of 2019⠀
⠀
All three can be ordered to-go at 112 Lake St. as well as online via beer.foambrewers.com. More to come tomorrow.⠀
⠀
#dipa #doubleipa #tripleipa #indiapaleale #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers on August 03, 2021. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Two freshies to hit the draft lines at 112 this week. Thanks to you all we've been kicking beers and constantly brewing that new new to replace em.⠀
⠀
Remembering Mountains is a 9.8% Triple IPA dry-hopped with Champlain.Valley.Hops Nugget, Whitefield Hops Cascade, and Zappa. This beer is a tropical fruit smoothie bomb allllll day. Notes of vanilla cream accompany a nutty mouthfeel. Not a bad option for a beaut like tonight. ⠀
⠀
Sand That Moves is certainly the lower ABV addition to the draft list, but not lacking in flavor. A 5.5% lactose Pale Ale, Sand That Moves was dry-hopped with NZ32 and @Champlain.valley.hops Cascade & Centennial. You'll find a fruit forward palate reminiscent of papaya and dragonfruit, with a creamy mouthfeel. This one's a go to if you're looking for an easy-sipper with plenty of flavor.⠀
⠀
Both beers are pouring on-site and in growlers to go!⠀
⠀
[Music + Food Tonight]⠀
@local_dork is spinning vinyl and setting the vibe tonight from 6-9pm and our guy Dave is slinging the vegan fire from his truck @dosfeosvt. Looks like he just pulled up!!
⠀
#rememberingmountains #karendalton #sharonvanetten #sandthatmoves #animalcollective #tripleipa #tipa #ipa #hoppybeer #paleale #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.text: A Monday evening in Burlington. We'll take it.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers on July 30, 2021. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
Introducing Sometimes Always, an Oat Double IPA.⠀
⠀
As the rain clears up for the weekend, we'll be enjoying our latest addition to the draft list. Sometimes Always was hopped with @champlain.valley.hops' Cascade in the whirlpool, and subsequently dry-hopped with El Dorado and Comet once in the fermenter. We utilized oats in this DIPA to contribute to that creamy mouthfeel reminding us of a creamsicle. This beer is wildly expressive of citrus and tropical notes, opening with a burst of candied orange peel leading into fresh squeezed pineapple juice. Sometimes Always is 8.8% abv and pouring on-site and in growlers to-go.⠀
⠀
[MUSIC TONIGHT]⠀
@reidparsonsmusic hits the stage at 9pm! Come through!⠀
#sometimesalways #doubleindiapaleale #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.text:
New drop of Galaxie 500 and She Doesn't Need U. Both available now in Burlington and Hinesburg.⠀
⠀
Galaxie 500, Double IPA. 9% ABV⠀
Dry-hopped with Galaxy⠀
Notes of crushed pineapple, papaya, soft⠀
Art by @pieceofpapermtl⠀
⠀
She Doesn't Need U, 7% IPA⠀
Dry-hopped w/ Nelson Sauvin, Mosaic, and El Dorado.⠀
Notes of melon and pear on the nose, with tropical notes of pineapple on the palate, and a slight dankness on the finish.⠀
Art by @liza_s_art⠀
⠀
You can walk up to either Burlington or Hinesburg, or order online and head to the brewery to pick them up.⠀
⠀
#galaxie500 #shedoesntneedu #dipa #ipa #indiapaleale #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.text:
Experimental Jet Set, Halo Bender, Alien Observer. Available... NOW. Fresh off the canning line. Walk up in Burlington or pre-order online and come ‘n pick ‘em up.⠀
⠀
Alien Observer, Fruited Gose conditioned on grapefruit, dragon fruit & sea salt⠀
Notes of refreshing, tart, grapefruit juice, Warhead candy, Greyhound cocktail, mild salinity. ⠀
Art by @jamietamgram⠀
⠀
Experimental Jet Set⠀
9.2% Double IPA⠀
Dry-hopped with Vic Secret and Citra⠀
Notes of tropical fruit, soft resin, nutty⠀
Art by @senormelon⠀
⠀
Halo Bender, 8.0% Double IPA⠀
Dry-hopped with Citra and Simcoe⠀
Citrus aroma, cantaloupe and apricot, slight piney note⠀
Art by @evoorhey⠀
⠀
#dipa #sourbeer #indiapaleale #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Foam Brewers on July 26, 2021 tagging @_thedregs, @dricepilaf, and @moderndraught. May be an image of one or more people and indoor.

node.text: That new draft system's pouring like butter. With the addition of the new bar earlier this month came an update to our draft system thanks to @moderndraught/@_thedregs, as well as new custom crafted brass tap handles by @dricepilaf. Shane from Modern Draught drove up from Boston to help us out and we're glad he did. We had to make sure the aesthetic matched the quality of work Shane did, and Derek Rice came through in the clutch with the handles. Pouring beers was already fun. Now it's even more fun.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers on July 23, 2021. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
All star draft lineup this weekend. Here are the latest additions to our extensive list. Hit up our website to see the full list of beers pouring at 112.⠀
⠀
All Things All At Once, 6.8% Tart Saison (in the teku)⠀
Fermented with our house saison yeast⠀
Tasting notes of apricot, guava candies, tart⠀
⠀
Better Distractions, 7.5% Single IPA⠀
Brewed with oats, hopped with Whitefield Hops' Centennial as well as Vic Secret and Eukanot‍⠀
Tasting Notes of orange creamsicle, pineapple, soft⠀
⠀
Brilliant Corners, 5% Oat Pale⠀
Dry-Hopped with Waimea & Ekuanot⠀
Tasting notes of green tea, mango, Llime zest⠀
⠀
The End Of Radio, 4.5% European Style Pale Ale⠀
Hopped With Hallertau Blanc⠀
Tasting notes of light, crisp, herbal, lemon, honeysuckle⠀
⠀
Looks like we have some divine lakefront weather coming our way today and tomorrow. Looking forward to sharing some of our new beers with you. Happy weekend everybody.⠀
⠀
#allthingsallatonce #tiredpony #betterdistractions #fayewebster #brilliantcorners #theloniousmonk #theendofradio #shellac ##doubleipa #dipa #ipa #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Foam Brewers on July 22, 2021 tagging @em.yardley, and @freestylehops. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Introducing KOHA, a brand new Double India Pale Ale brewed in collaboration with our New Zealand hop growing friends @freestylehops.⠀
⠀
This beer came as the result of years of working together with the good folks at Freestyle. Masters of their trade, the growers at Freestyle have been providing us with exceptional hops which contribute distinct flavor and aroma to many of our beers. This Double IPA in particular was built around their Riwaka and Southern Cross, imparting a myriad of delicious citrus forward flavors onto this beer. KOHA opens up with vibrant notes of ripe honeydew melon and citrus on the nose. On the palate we experience candied orange peel and sweet citrus, followed by a hint of vanilla bean on the finish. KOHA is 8% abv and available at the brewery now in limited quantities. Order online to reserve your cans ahead of time. $18/4pack. Limit 1 case per person.⠀
⠀
We are very happy to have worked with our longtime friend, Emma Yardley (@Em.yardley) for the art on this can. Originally from Vermont, Emma is currently living out west after years of travelling the country and world, including a good stint in New Zealand. Among other things, Emma regularly draws inspiration from nature, specifically rivers and flowing water. As an illustrator, her ownership of line drawing is mesmerizing and awe inspiring. Her work reminds us of both the beautiful place we live, and of the New Zealand shoreline at the same time. We decided on the name KOHA, which means gift in Māori, the language of people indigenous to New Zealand. Emma, thank you so much for bringing this can to life. We look forward to sharing one with you soon.⠀
⠀
#koha #freestylehops #newzealandhops #collaboration #dipa #ipa #doubleipa #riwaka #southerncross #indiapaleale #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

Pavement, The Fruit That Ate Itself, Canvas. Fresh cans, available at the brewery now.⠀

Pavement - 8.2% Double IPA⠀
Dry-hopped w/ Citra and Mosaic⠀
Notes of mango, citrus and passion fruit⠀
Art by @marylacy⠀

Dry-hopped with all Nugget this week⠀

[Canvas Contest Reminder!]⠀
The deadline for our Canvas contest is this weekend!! To participate, create art on a can of Canvas or on the template on our website, and hashtag #foamcanvascontest. The winner receives $200 and your art on a run of Canvas! Runner ups receive Foam gift cards! For more details, Head our website > bottom of the page > Help > Canvas Contest.⠀
⠀
#pavement #thefruitthatateitself #canvas  #paleale #dipa #ipa #indiapaleale #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart
